#include <stdio.h>


int main()
{
	//freopen("statues.in","rt",stdin);
	int i,k,n,sum,avgh,h[55];
	int caseno = 1;

	while(scanf("%d",&n) && n != 0)
	{
		for(i=sum=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",h+i);
			sum += h[i];
		}
		avgh = sum/n;
		for(i=k=0;i<n;i++) if(h[i] > avgh) k += h[i] - avgh;
		printf("Set #%d\n",caseno++);
		printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",k);
	}
	return 0;
}
